title: New Friends for the next 2 weeks!!!
body:
Hey Guys,

Silver player here that plays any role.
Just jumped for DOTA to LoL so need people to earn that juicing IP the next few wees to unlock more champions!

Add me as I play alot! (screw uni :P)

Cheerio

replies.body:
Haha, it's good to see threads like this.
Also hoping to meet up with people during this ip boost period

Leki3
Mar3thyu also looking for people to "party" with
